name: projectmanagement
description: A full stack project management app built using a PERN stack as part of the final project for Codecademy's Full Stack Engineer course.

scripts.dev: dotenvx run -- npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
